FILE: cm255367v11.0.txt
DYAD: GERMANY/PRUSSIA-LATVIA
RIVALRY: RIV695
DISPUTE(S): MID1269 
RIVALRY: RIV696
DISPUTE(S): MID3723 

PS: 19181118-19400616 .5 20040501-20209999 1.00

PS-UPDATE2020:

PSNOTES: ends when Latvia is absorbed by USSR Latvia became a member of the COW System on 19910906. 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20220225 
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20220225

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

WWII MIDs: MID3723 

MID1269 

TERRMID: MID1269 1 -- territorial MID
TERRMID-CER: MID1269 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID1269 from (Gibler 2018), in 1919, Germany invaded Latvia to establish a protectorate there, with intentions of moving on into Estonia (Germany did invade Estonia, but was pushed back by the Estonian army). The Allies eventually intervened and brokered an armistice between all parties. Coded territorial MID because this was connected to a territorial dispute between Germany and Latvia. 

TERRLINK: MID1269 3 -- not third party link to territory
TERRLINK-CER: MID1269 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID1269 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID1269 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID1269 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID1269 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID1269 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID1269 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID1269 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1269 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID1269 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1269 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID1269 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID1269 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES:
